body.name: AKIHE 36 inch Plug-in or Hardwired LED Indirect Under Cabinet Lights, 3 Color Settings - 3000K/3500K/4000K, Indirect Under Cabinet Lighting, linkable, Under Counter Lights for Kitchen,ETL Listed
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 15 hrs 11 mins
features: ✅NEW INDIRECT LIGHT TECHNOLOGY：This is the world's first LED indirect cabinet light. Hidden LED light source, no hot spot. Reflect and diffuse light from the LED light source with high-tech reflectors. It has a more luminous area to bring soft and even light. More emitting area means less shadow.

✅MORE OPTIONS FEATURES：Linkable,up to 500W, Hardwired installation also is available. 3CCT, You can set the color temperature from Warm White (3000K), Neutral White (3500K), Bright White (4000K). Different Lengths, It is available from12inch,18 inch,24inch,36inch,42inch. ON/OFF on the surface.

✅HIGH QUALITY LIGHTING： Compared with cabinet lights of the same length, high-end LED chips are used with high brightness,1760LM. High color rendering index CRI 90, more colorful. The overall structure of die-cast aluminum profiles brings different high-quality products, superior to plastic and iron (metal).

✅NEW DIFFERENT PERSONALITY: The appearance of its light outlet is completely different from that of traditional cabinet lights. There is no cover plate for the light outlet of the under-cabinet light, which makes your renovation have a different personality. Its light is indirect light from the light outlet, which is a cool concept for our lighting use.

✅WARRANTY & SAFE: LED lifetime is 50,000hours. We support 3 years Warranty. Our company is in California. Our patents are pending in the USA. ETL Listed, certifications guarantee top-quality products and safety. We support the guarantee policy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good light for dark places.
reviews.reviewText: I got the LED light over my sink from a big box store. It was nice and bright but it also hit me right in the eyes no matter where I placed it. I got this as a replacement to address that problem.My light is hardwired and this light also allows for that. It can also be part of a string of undercounter lights (cord included) or plugged into an outlet (also cord included). It was easy to wire. My only problem arose with the front of the light not hanging flush. No matter how I adjusted the mounting screws, I couldn't find the sweet spot because they are located toward the back of the light and usually, they are centered to avoid this. No worries. I had a piece of heavy duty double sided tape that was extra from when I installed my dashcam. Now it hangs perfectly.I like that you have a choice between color temperatures. I wish it were a bit brighter but that's because I'm old. Nonetheless, this gets five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Akihe 18 inch Plug-in LED lights
reviews.reviewText: Very good light, we like it very much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very bright. Good color rendering. Much improvement over fluorescent that it replaced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and bright
reviews.reviewText: Pros-1. Bright diffuse lighting covering pleasant amber to near daylight coloring.2. Very easy installation.3. All the cords necessary to setup.4. Screws included.Cons-1. Wall cord might be too short for certain applications.2. Two screws may not be enough.3. Only one small light switch on one end.Summary - The lighting is bright enough for installing over my kitchen sink and countertop but unfortunately the provided cord was a bit short to do proper cable management to my outlet. I'll have to either get a short extension cord or use this somewhere else like my workbench. It's touted diffusion pattern is supposed to be the main selling point but most lighting of this type that mimics fluorescent tubes are already diffused enough so you may not tell the difference. The included wood screws is a plus but I feel like the light might need about 4 screws to properly distribute the weight. The whole light isn't heavy though. Perhaps 2 screws is all that is needed but my kitchen cabinets are press board and I know overtime press board is not that strong for load bearing stuff. If my cabinets were true wooden ones, I'd have much more confident in having just two screws. There are additional knockout holes if you want more mounting options. To mount the light you have to temporarily remove the long panel to reveal the screw holes for mounting. You can also do some daisy chaining the same type of light, a linking power cable is provided. The CRI rating of 90, I'll have to take the manufacturer's word for it. Who knows maybe I can use it for product photography lighting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A lot of even bright light focused on my countertops
reviews.reviewText: I bought this light fixture to replace a standard old time fluorescent bulb style under cabinets over my kitchen sink. Initially I had replaced the old time model with puck lights that didn’t provide enough light and ran through batteries quickly. This new fixture gives the brightest and most consistent light on the sink and countertops.. I got the plug in model and liked it so much that I bought a second to go under the cabinets over the countertops to the left of the sink. I like that you can choose from 3 levels of light on each fixture by sliding a button.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ditch the Old Under Cabinet Garage Lights
reviews.reviewText: I used to have a 24 inch flourescent light under this cabinet you see in the photos. It was fine, but I really wanted to try an LED since they require so much less energy to use, and I've read they are brighter.This light is easy to install. There is instructions included that are actually usable. You can either hard wire it or use the included 4 foot cord (this is the method I used, since my last light was installed this way by the previous owner.)This light is very low profile, and wow is it bright. Not so bright that it is offensive, but it really lights up a workspace. The switch is fairly easy to locate (it's that small white toggle on the same surface as the light, you can barey see it in my first photo at the far end.)Room for improvement: I wish the cord was a little longer, but where does that end; 6 feet would be nice. Also, the switch could be a little larger. Otherwise, this is a great light.Thanks AKIHE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very bright, even light.
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty standard install and it is brighter than I thought it would be. I liked the easily selectable color temperature so I could match it to my existing fixtures. It comes with wire nuts if you want to hardwire it or a regular edition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely bright enough.
reviews.reviewText: It doesn’t cover a standard 4” light outlet but it was easy to install and it’s definitely bright. Light temperature control is easy enough.
